thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Mr B L Barnsby
thread.title_full: AMOMA.com bewertet von Mr B L Barnsby

author: Mr B L Barnsby
title: Mr B L Barnsby
text: We know the hotel well from several visits to Bratislava but never before stayed there. Overall very pleased with the time spent here. Spacious room and bathroom, great breakfast and sauna. Location is perfect for transport, shops and The Old Town. Slightly disappointed with greeting at registration and lack of information to start you off. Probably due to staff fatigue. Had to ask for housekeeping to sort a few obvious miss givings, quickly sorted though. Would go back as we got a great deal...
